column4: i'm basically, finding out why i cannot talk to another machine.i do traceroute, Does it mean, that first box where time out happens is the culprit?
it could, or it could also mean that the first host responds to the port that traceroute is trying to probe
for a different view, try using traceroute -I
or traceroute -p xx, where xx is a udp port you wish to probe
